title: wine_Tensley_2015_Colson_Canyon_Vineyard_Syrah_(Santa_Barbara_County)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 91662.
country: US.
description: This bottling is still very young and will vastly improve with time, but already shows many of the components that make this remote mountain-surrounded vineyard one of the more exciting slices of the region. Aromas of black currant and purple flowers are deep and heady, while the palate's richer blackberry-syrup notes are cut by a black-plum tang, fresh underbrush herbaceousness and tons of cola spice..
designation: Colson Canyon Vineyard.
points: 91.
price: 42.0.
province: California.
region_1: Santa Barbara County.
region_2: Central Coast.
taster_name: Matt Kettmann.
taster_twitter_handle: @mattkettmann.
